mapper.select: SELECT TRIM(DocClassID) AS no ,ClassName AS nodeName , IF(CNT > 0,'0','6') AS type ,ParentDocClassID AS pno ,KeepYear #,SortKey AS SortKey ,CONCAT(ParentDocClassID, ' ', SortKey) AS SortKey #,CONCAT(ParentDocClassID, ' ', DocClassID, ' ', SortKey) AS SortKey #,'#' AS url ,'N' AS chk ,IF(CNT > 0,'N','Y') AS rdo FROM ( SELECT A.* , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ) AS CNT FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_docclass A ) T WHERE EntCode = #{EntCode} ORDER BY SortKey

SELECT TRIM(DocClassID) AS no ,ClassName AS nodeName , IF(CNT > 0,'0','6') AS type ,ParentDocClassID AS pno ,KeepYear #,SortKey AS SortKey ,CONCAT(ParentDocClassID, ' ', SortKey) AS SortKey #,CONCAT(ParentDocClassID, ' ', DocClassID, ' ', SortKey) AS SortKey #,'#' AS url ,'N' AS chk ,IF(CNT > 0,'N','Y') AS rdo FROM ( SELECT A.* , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ) AS CNT FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_docclass A ) T
EntCode = #{EntCode}
EntCode IN (#{EntCode}, 'ORGROOT')
ORDER BY SortKey

SELECT TRIM(DocClassID) AS no ,ClassName AS nodeName , IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_docclass B WHERE B.ParentDocClassID = A.DocClassID AND B.EntCode = A.EntCode ) > 0,'0','6') AS type ,ParentDocClassID AS pno ,KeepYear ,SortKey ,'#' AS url ,'N' AS chk ,'N' AS rdo FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_docclass A WHERE DocClassID = #{DocClassID} AND EntCode = #{EntCode}
SELECT DomainCode AS optionValue ,Displayname as optionText FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain WHERE DeleteDate IS NULL AND IsUse = 'Y'
